column5: WHAT A WAY TO START THE NEW YR!! AWSOME DAY OF STEELHEADING!!! GOT OUT AT 4AM BY MYSELF TODAY!! WAS A SLOW START ONLY GETTIN 4 IN THE DARK BUT IT WAS FLOATS DOWN THE SECOND DAYLIGHT CAME!!! ENED UP GOIN 15/22!! ONLY A FEW PICS CAUSE I WAS BY MYSELF AND I LIKE TO RELEASE MY FISH QUICK!!
Great pic's and solo outing!  You are the river king bro!
nice steelies.. thanks for the report!  but why are you shouting? that excited? LOL  Gerritt.
15 for 22 ....WOW.  Congrats on a great day.  Beautiful fish and pics.
Gotta luv a day like that, nice fish.
WOW...  thats an amazing catch,way to go nice report and gotta love those pics
Nice steelhead's 15/22 man wat a day that must have been i bet your arms r tired. Well if i had caught that many my ars would have been tired. U must be the Chrome King.lol   jordan
Nice Fish Man, crazy looking reel too, is that a riverrun?  the fish must not have been very picky today judging by all the different baits.
Great job, as always CC!  Keep the pics comming!
TX GUYZ!! YA ITS A RIVERRUN!!! FISH WERENT PICKY AT ALL!!! THERE WERE SO MANY  LOL
wow is all i can say!

WOW CC! Im headin out tomorrow morning, Oshawa...  any tips for me? lol, Im armed with fresh roe, jigs and pink worms that I picked up yesterday after slipping and loosing most of my stuff to the river because a pocket in the vest was open. Hopefully Ill have the same results!
Nice report and pics.  Congrats on a great day out!  I will be getting out for steelies myself again soon since there doesn't look like any ice in the near future!  Good fishing!  Aaron
Nice !!! Great start for the New Year Scott !  Im heading out over the next day or two .... PM me if you're looking to get back out  Jon.

I GOT LITTLE C FOR THE NEXT 2 DAYS(WIFE WORKIN) BUT HOPE TO GET OUT AFTER THAT!! TIPS FOR YA!! ITS GONNA BE ABIT TOUGH CAUSE THE WATERS ARE REALLY CLEANING UP FAST!!! WATER WAS MINT TODAY!!! THAT DARK GREEN!!! JUST MAKE SURE YOUR AT YOUR SPOT FOR LIKE 7AM LATEST!!! IF YA KNOW YOUR RIVER FISH THE DEEPEST POOL FIRST!!! I KNOW ITS A PAIN IN THE ARSE AND YA DONT GOT 40LB POWER PRO BUT YA GOTTA FIND THE WOOD AND BASS FISH THEM  LOL  GOOD LUCK GUYS!!!  TOUGH TIME TO GET OUT (CLEAR WATER) BUT GOOD LUCK!!
Nice fish, Congrats on a great start to the new year.
Wood, deep water, sounds good. 7 AM...not gonna happen because mom isnt wakin up to drive me fishin at 7 AM on january 3rd and I cant have the car. Oh well, we do what we can
Nice fish!  Keep me in mind if you ever want to get rid of some of those old reels.   Nice outfit!  Pam

Nice chromers!  I love float fishing but only on my second year.  Can I find steelhead in many of the rivers and streams around my area (Hamilton) or should I be travelling north or east into the U.S?  I know many areas around me are also closed.  Without giving away you spot CC can u give a general idea of where you are catching them, like north of Toronto or in the U.S, that would be great.  JFish

any creek (big or small) that runs into lake ont with have trout in it bro(im sure if i tried i could find some in the don  LOL)  i live in the east of toronto so i fish out here but theres tons of creeks in your neck of the woods!!im sure a few hamilton resies can help ya out!!!
Everyone is crying for ice, and you are catching fish. When ya got lemmons, you make lemonaid!!
